mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_INO.NEXTVAL FROM dual
insert into Inquiry(ino, mid, ititle , icontent, iattachoname, iattachdata,iattachtype, icreatedat,iupdatedat,ireply,istatus) values (#{ino},#{mid}, #{ititle}, #{ icontent}, #{iattachoname}, #{iattachdata}, #{iattachtype} , systimestamp, systimestamp, #{ireply}, #{istatus})
